text:
Chatted w/ a family member who's a pharmacist & was initially hesitant to get #CovidVaccine. 
Got first dose 💉 a couple weeks ago. Getting 2nd shot next week. 

About his experience:
▶️ fatigue & malaise next day but otherwise OK 👌 

#COVID19 #vaccine #science #vaccination https://t.co/SNw0cDPIKy
